item.title: Instamart shopping lists
item.description:
I remember reading an X thread almost a year back about Instamart launching Shopping lists feature in beta.

I hate ordering groceries as much as the next person & I never noticed this feature on Swiggy. Not until today.

So, naturally I tried using it.

Some background on how I order:

  • I avg. around 25-30 Instamart orders a month (about 15 greater than Rs 500 AOV) & I don’t use any other quick-commerce platform (because of the Swiggy HDFC 10% cashback)
  • Most (if not all) of my AOV gte Rs 500 orders include repeated SKUs (Yogurt, Paneer, Eggs, veggies, fruits, etc.)
  • I also don’t switch brands often. I’m not a bargain hunter, I’ve come to some brands which Swiggy shows as Previously Bought & those are the ones I end up ordering.

So, I’m pretty much a power user. Shopping Lists could be a super time saving feature for me. But it missed quite a few beats.
